mapper.select: SELECT cycle1.cycle_id, cycle1.parent_cycle_id, cycle1.folder_id, cycle1.cycle_name, cycle1.type, cycle1.version_id, cycle1.description, cycle1.build, cycle1.environment, cycle1.from_date, cycle1.to_date, cycle1.object_version_number, cycle1.created_by, cycle1.rank, cycle1.project_id, color1.color, color1.counts, color1.statusName, color1.statusId FROM test_cycle cycle1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT color, count( 1 ) counts, temp1.cycle_id, statusId, statusName FROM ( SELECT cycle.execute_id, cycle.cycle_id, status1.status_id statusId, status1.status_color color, status1.status_name statusName FROM test_cycle_case cycle LEFT JOIN test_status status1 ON cycle.execution_status = status1.status_id ) temp1 GROUP BY temp1.statusId, temp1.cycle_id ) color1 ON color1.cycle_id = cycle1.cycle_id WHERE cycle1.parent_cycle_id = #{cycleId} ORDER BY cycle1.cycle_id, cycle1.rank, color1.statusId
